title: Nukkleus Inc. Receives Shareholder Approval to Acquire Star 26 Capital Inc.
summary: NEW YORK and TEL AVIV, Israel, Dec. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nukkleus Inc. (NASDAQ: NUKK) (Nukkleus or the Company), a strategic acquirer and developer of high-potential businesses in the aerospace and defense (A&D) industry, today announced that its stockholders have approved the acquisition of Star 26 Capital Inc., a defense-focused acquisition company. The transaction is expected to close before December 31, 2025.
